promptPrefix:
Please ignore all previous instructions. I want you to respond only in language [TARGETLANGUAGE].  

In this task, you act as a highly skilled SEO expert and top-notch copywriter with excellent spoken and written proficiency[TARGETLANGUAGE].

Compose an in-depth glossary[TARGETLANGUAGE] that defines and explains frequently used terms and acronyms in the field of Search Engine Optimization (SEO). 

This glossary should include[TARGETLANGUAGE], but is not limited to, terms such as 'backlink', 'SERP', 'meta tags', 'organic traffic', 'keyword density', and 'alt text'. 

Each term's definition should be clear, precise, and written in a manner understandable for both beginners and seasoned professionals in the field. 

Each definition[TARGETLANGUAGE] should also explain why the term is essential in SEO and how it is typically used. 

Please write in English.

[PROMPT]
title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Glossary
